content.en: Enhancing SAR Imaging: Researchers have been exploring the use of compressed sensing theory to improve the resolution of synthetic aperture radar (SAR) imaging. By reducing the sample size of SAR echo, the compressed sensing method can achieve high-resolution imaging of sparse targets. Various algorithms, such as Stolt-CS, NUFFT-CS, and structured Bayesian compressive sensing, have been proposed to enhance the imaging performance of SAR and reduce data acquisition requirements.
content.da: Forbedring af SAR-billeddannelse: Forskere har udforsket brugen af komprimeret sansningsteori for at forbedre opløsningen af syntetisk aperturradar (SAR) billeddannelse. Ved at reducere prøvestørrelsen af SAR-ekko kan komprimeret sansningsmetoden opnå højopløsningsbilleddannelse af sparsomme mål. Forskellige algoritmer, såsom Stolt-CS, NUFFT-CS og struktureret Bayesian komprimeret sansning, er blevet foreslået for at forbedre billeddannelsesydelsen af SAR og reducere kravene til dataindsamling.
